title: Sales Representative Job at Tybitx Services International Limited
content:
Tybitx Services International Limited - Our client, an integrated agro-allied processing company, is recruiting results-driven candidates to drive product sales, expand market share, and build strong relationships with distributors, retailers, and customers in the capacity below:

Job Position: Sales Representative
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The role involves ensuring product visibility and availability, identifying and recruiting distributors, monitoring sales performance and market trends, managing inventory and debtors, and resolving customer complaints promptly while meeting and exceeding sales targets.


Key Responsibilities


	Promote and sell products to existing and prospective customers.
	Identify, recruit, and maintain relationships with distributors and retailers.
	Handle collections and manage debtor accounts.
	Prepare and submit regular sales and inventory reports.
	Monitor sales performance, competitor activities, and market trends.
	Ensure timely deliveries, stock rotation, and inventory accuracy.
	Resolve customer complaints and report feedback to management.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND / HND / B.Sc in a relevant field.
	Proven sales experience in FMCG or related industry.
	Strong negotiation, presentation, and communication skills.
	Target-driven with strong relationship-building abilities.
	Knowledge of inventory and sales reporting.
	Proactive with good market analysis skills.


Salary
N100,000 / Month.

title: Inventory Officer Job at Firewood Rice Nigeria
content:
At Firewood Rice Nigeria, we don’t just serve meals - we serve memories. With a deep-rooted love for authentic Nigerian dishes, we’ve built a brand that delivers comfort, flavor, and joy to our customers across Lagos. Our energetic team is the secret sauce behind our success, and we’re growing fast! If you love food, innovation, and working in a vibrant, forward-thinking environment, we want you with us.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Inventory Officer

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilties
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Monitor daily stock levels of raw materials, packaging items, and finished food products.
	Record and update all inventory transactions in the system (manual or digital).
	Ensure First-In-First-Out (FIFO) method is strictly adhered to for perishables.
	Conduct daily, weekly and monthly routine stock counts and reconcile with records.
	Issue items to kitchen staff based on approved requisitions and document usage.
	Ensure timely and accurate documentation of all stock movements.
	Maintain accurate inventory records including stock cards, bin cards, and system entries.
	Report discrepancies or unusual stock variations to the Inventory Supervisor or Operations Manager.
	Receive incoming supplies from vendors and verify quantity and quality against invoices/delivery notes.
	Label and store materials in designated storage areas, ensuring proper stock rotation.
	Prepare and submit daily, weekly, and monthly inventory reports.
	Assist in preparing inventory valuation reports and audits.
	Ensure storage areas are clean, organized, and pest-free.
	Monitor expiry dates of consumables and escalate issues for prompt action.
	Ensure cold room and dry store items are stored at appropriate temperatures and conditions.
	Liaise with procurement, kitchen staff, and other departments to ensure adequate stock planning.
	Alert management in advance about low stock or potential shortages.
	Support in periodic audits and compliance reviews as required.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with 2 - 4 years of experience.


Salary
N90,000 - N100,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: firewoodjollofcareers@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Business Development Lead Job at Eden Solution and Resources Limited
content:
Eden Solution and Resources Limited, Formed in 2002 has rapidly become one of Nigeria’s leading providers of staffing services. We endeavour to supply quality and innovative staffing services to all of our clients. Eden Solutions & Resources is managed by a team of competent professionals. Eden Solutions and Resources was conceived by the founders with the express purpose of helping Start-up’s, SME’s and established businesses to accomplish their growth objective and remain relevant in their industries for long. To achieve this vision, Eden Solutions and Resources has evolved from an organization offering only recruitment services to small businesses to a major regional player.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Our industry-specific focus allows us to develop a depth of experience, expertise, and connections many Other Similar Firms Cannot Match. We are a conscientious Human Resource Management Firm that delivers exceptional, tailor-made, and cost-efficient Workforce and Organizational Management Solutions to our esteemed clientele worldwide. Our unwavering commitment to industry-specific specialization empowers us to cultivate a profound reservoir of experience, expertise, and connections, setting us apart from numerous comparable firms operating in our area.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Lead

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)

Job Summary


	We are seeking an experienced and strategic Business Development Lead to drive market growth, lead client engagement initiatives, and build a high-performing business support team.
	This is a senior leadership opportunity for a results-driven professional who thrives in dynamic environments and is passionate about building scalable systems that drive business success.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute strategies to acquire and retain high-value clients
	Oversee branding, proposal development, and digital visibility efforts
	Lead and mentor a business support team (proposals, marketing, and client services)
	Identify and formalize strategic partnerships to expand market influence
	Collaborate with leadership to align growth strategies with the firm's vision


Ideal Candidate Profile


	5–10 years of proven experience in business development, strategic sales, or client acquisition
	Strong leadership skills with experience managing a business development or marketing team
	Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation abilities
	Digitally savvy—comfortable turning digital engagement into measurable growth
	Entrepreneurial mindset with a proactive and goal-oriented approach.


What’s on Offer


	N250,000 Monthly Gross Salary, plus performance-based commissions
	Leadership exposure and opportunity for executive growth
	A collaborative, high-impact, and values-driven work environment
	The opportunity to directly shape the growth strategy of a forward-thinking consulting firm.


Application Closing Date
31st August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a 1-page Cover Letter to: recruitment@edensrpeople.com using “Business Development Lead – Abuja” as the subject of the mail.
